A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"Let go of the past\"-Kylo .....Long time Star Wars fans have to do the same. The SW movies of the past (not counting prequels) are classics. But this is a new day and age a new future for our beloved characters...in Force Awakens and Last Jedi our characters are older and have to adjust to the times its a whole new galaxy with new enemies. With that said this movie goes into a new direction phasing out our old heroes and presenting the new future heroes of Star Wars. Only weakness in this movie is the whole Finn/Casino plot line...a waste of time that slows down the movie. Audience/Fans have to let go of the luke we all know and accept this older yet wiser one.
